note.p: Spanish diplomat. Spanish consul at Amoy (now Xiamen), China, in 1866, 1867. Married Emily Catherine Adolphine Weishaupt (1843–89; born in London to an Austrian father and a mother from Gibraltar; of Borgfelde, Hamburg, Germany, at her death) in London in 1868. Spanish consul in Newcastle-upon-Tyne, from 28 December 1868 into the 1870s. Died in Osterode, Saxony.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1494/744/11), 1871 RG10/5076/37/6)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 November 2022)
letter from Robert Swinhoe to Sir Joseph Dalton Hooker, 10 December 1866 (Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew (Directors’ Correspondence 151/955))
